ayah: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ
ayah_translit: bali alladhina kafaru fi izzatin washiqaqin
ayah_english: Nay those who disbelieve (are) in self-glory and opposition

ayah: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ فَنَادَواْ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٖ
ayah_translit: kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin fanadaw walata hina manasin
ayah_english: How many We destroyed before them before them of a generation then they called out when there (was) no longer time (for) escape

ayah: وَعَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٌ
ayah_translit: wa'ajibu an jaahum mundhirun min'hum waqala al-kafiruna hadha sahirun kadhabun
ayah_english: And they wonder that has come to them a warner from among themselves And said the disbelievers This (is) a magician a liar

ayah: أَجَعَلَ ٱلۡأٓلِهَةَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عُجَابٞ
ayah_translit: aja'ala al-alihata ilahan wahidan inna hadha lashayon ujabun
ayah_english: Has he made the gods (into) one god (into) one god Indeed this (is) certainly a thing curious

ayah: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱمۡشُواْ وَٱصۡبِرُواْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٞ يُرَادُ
ayah_translit: wa-intalaqa al-mala-u min'hum ani im'shu wa-is'biru ala alihatikum inna hadha lashayon yuradu
ayah_english: And went forth the chiefs among them that Continue and be patient over your gods Indeed this (is) certainly a thing intended

ayah: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱمۡشُواْ وَٱصۡبِرُواْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٞ يُرَادُ
ayah_translit: wa-intalaqa al-mala-u min'hum ani im'shu wa-is'biru ala alihatikum inna hadha lashayon yuradu
ayah_english: And went forth the chiefs among them that Continue and be patient over your gods Indeed this (is) certainly a thing intended

ayah: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ
ayah_translit: ma sami'na bihadha fi al-milati al-akhirati in hadha illa ikh'tilaqun
ayah_english: Not we heard of this in the religion the last Not (is) this but a fabrication

ayah: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّن ذِكۡرِيۚ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِ
ayah_translit: a-unzila alayhi al-dhik'ru min baynina bal hum fi shakkin min dhik'ri bal lamma yadhuqu adhabi
ayah_english: Has been revealed to him the Message from among us Nay They (are) in doubt about My Message Nay not they have tasted My punishment

ayah: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ
ayah_translit: am indahum khazainu rahmati rabbika al-'azizi al-wahabi
ayah_english: Or have they (the) treasures (of the) Mercy (of) your Lord the All-Mighty the Bestower

ayah: أَمۡ لَهُم مُّلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: am lahum mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma falyartaqu fi al-asbabi
ayah_english: Or for them (is the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between them Then let them ascend by the means

ayah: أَمۡ لَهُم مُّلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبِ

ayah: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ
ayah_translit: jundun ma hunalika mahzumun mina al-ahzabi
ayah_english: Soldiers there there (they will be) defeated among the companies

ayah: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

ayah: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلۡأَيۡدِۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
ayah_translit: is'bir ala ma yaquluna wa-udh'kur abdana dawuda dha al-aydi innahu awwabun
ayah_english: Be patient over what they say and remember Our slave Dawood the possessor of strength the possessor of strength Indeed, he (was) repeatedly turning

ayah_english: Be patient over what they say and remember Our slave Dawood the possessor of strength the possessor of strength Indeed, he (was) repeatedly turning

ayah: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلۡأَيۡدِۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

ayah: إِنَّا سَخَّرۡنَا ٱلۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِشۡرَاقِ
ayah_translit: inna sakharna al-jibala ma'ahu yusabbih'na bil-'ashiyi wal-ish'raqi
ayah_english: Indeed We subjected the mountains with him glorifying in the evening and [the] sunrise

ayah: وَٱلطَّيۡرَ مَحۡشُورَةٗۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٞ
ayah_translit: wal-tayra mahshuratan kullun lahu awwabun
ayah_english: And the birds assembled all with him repeatedly turning

ayah: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ
ayah_translit: washadadna mul'kahu waataynahu al-hik'mata wafasla al-khitabi
ayah_english: And We strengthened his kingdom and We gave him [the] wisdom and decisive speech

ayah: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ

ayah: ۞وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُواْ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابَ
ayah_translit: wahal ataka naba-u al-khasmi idh tasawwaru al-mih'raba
ayah_english: And has (there) come to you (the) news (of) the litigants when they climbed over the wall (of) the chamber

ayah: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنۡهُمۡۖ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡۖ خَصۡمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعۡضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا تُشۡطِطۡ وَٱهۡدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
ayah_translit: idh dakhalu ala dawuda fafazi'a min'hum qalu la takhaf khasmani bagha ba'duna ala ba'din fa-uh'kum baynana bil-haqi wala tush'tit wa-ih'dina ila sawai al-sirati
ayah_english: When they entered upon Dawood and he was afraid of them they said (Do) not fear (We are) two litigants has wronged one of us to another so judge between us in truth and (do) not be unjust and guide us to an even [the] path

ayah: إِنَّ هَٰذَآ أَخِي لَهُۥ تِسۡعٞ وَتِسۡعُونَ نَعۡجَةٗ وَلِيَ نَعۡجَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَقَالَ أَكۡفِلۡنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي ٱلۡخِطَابِ
ayah_translit: inna hadha akhi lahu tis'un watis'una na'jatan waliya na'jatun wahidatun faqala akfil'niha wa'azzani fi al-khitabi
ayah_english: Indeed this (is) my brother he has ninety-nine ninety-nine ewe(s) while I have ewe one so he said Entrust her to me and he overpowered me in [the] speech

ayah_english: Indeed this (is) my brother he has ninety-nine ninety-nine ewe(s) while I have ewe one so he said Entrust her to me and he overpowered me in [the] speech

ayah: إِنَّ هَٰذَآ أَخِي لَهُۥ تِسۡعٞ وَتِسۡعُونَ نَعۡجَةٗ وَلِيَ نَعۡجَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَقَالَ أَكۡفِلۡنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي ٱلۡخِطَابِ

ayah: قَالَ لَقَدۡ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعۡجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبۡغِي بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَقَلِيلٞ مَّا هُمۡۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسۡتَغۡفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّۤ رَاكِعٗاۤ وَأَنَابَ۩
ayah_translit: qala laqad zalamaka bisuali na'jatika ila ni'ajihi wa-inna kathiran mina al-khulatai layabghi ba'duhum ala ba'din illa alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati waqalilun ma hum wazanna dawudu annama fatannahu fa-is'taghfara rabbahu wakharra raki'an wa-anaba
ayah_english: He said Certainly he has wronged you by demanding your ewe to his ewes And indeed many of the partners certainly oppress one [on] another except those who believe and do righteous deeds and few (are) they (are) they And became certain Dawood that We (had) tried him and he asked forgiveness (of) his Lord and fell down bowing and turned in repentance

ayah: قَالَ لَقَدۡ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعۡجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبۡغِي بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَقَلِيلٞ مَّا هُمۡۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسۡتَغۡفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّۤ رَاكِعٗاۤ وَأَنَابَ۩

ayah: قَالَ لَقَدۡ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعۡجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبۡغِي بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَقَلِيلٞ مَّا هُمۡۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسۡتَغۡفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّۤ رَاكِعٗاۤ وَأَنَابَ۩
ayah_translit: qala laqad zalamaka bisuali na'jatika ila ni'ajihi wa-inna kathiran mina al-khulatai layabghi ba'duhum ala ba'din illa alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati waqalilun ma hum wazanna dawudu annama fatannahu fa-is'taghfara rabbahu wakharra raki'an wa-anaba

ayah: قَالَ لَقَدۡ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعۡجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبۡغِي بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَقَلِيلٞ مَّا هُمۡۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسۡتَغۡفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّۤ رَاكِعٗاۤ وَأَنَابَ۩
ayah_translit: qala laqad zalamaka bisuali na'jatika ila ni'ajihi wa-inna kathiran mina al-khulatai layabghi ba'duhum ala ba'din illa alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati waqalilun ma hum wazanna dawudu annama fatannahu fa-is'taghfara rabbahu wakharra raki'an wa-anaba

ayah: فَغَفَرۡنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ
ayah_translit: faghafarna lahu dhalika wa-inna lahu indana lazul'fa wahus'na maabin
ayah_english: So We forgave for him that And indeed for him with Us surely is a near access and a good place of return

ayah: يَٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰكَ خَلِيفَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدُۢ بِمَا نَسُواْ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
ayah_translit: yadawudu inna ja'alnaka khalifatan fi al-ardi fa-uh'kum bayna al-nasi bil-haqi wala tattabi'i al-hawa fayudillaka an sabili al-lahi inna alladhina yadilluna an sabili al-lahi lahum adhabun shadidun bima nasu yawma al-hisabi
ayah_english: O Dawood! Indeed We [We] have made you a vicegerent in the earth so judge between [the] men in truth and (do) not follow the desire for it will lead you stray from (the) way (of) Allah Indeed those who go astray from (the) way (of) Allah for them (is) a punishment severe because they forgot (the) Day (of) Account

ayah: يَٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰكَ خَلِيفَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدُۢ بِمَا نَسُواْ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
ayah_translit: yadawudu inna ja'alnaka khalifatan fi al-ardi fa-uh'kum bayna al-nasi bil-haqi wala tattabi'i al-hawa fayudillaka an sabili al-lahi inna alladhina yadilluna an sabili al-lahi lahum adhabun shadidun bima nasu yawma al-hisabi

ayah: يَٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰكَ خَلِيفَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدُۢ بِمَا نَسُواْ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
ayah_translit: yadawudu inna ja'alnaka khalifatan fi al-ardi fa-uh'kum bayna al-nasi bil-haqi wala tattabi'i al-hawa fayudillaka an sabili al-lahi inna alladhina yadilluna an sabili al-lahi lahum adhabun shadidun bima nasu yawma al-hisabi

ayah: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا بَٰطِلٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wama khalaqna al-samaa wal-arda wama baynahuma batilan dhalika zannu alladhina kafaru fawaylun lilladhina kafaru mina al-nari
ayah_english: And not We created the heaven and the earth and whatever (is) between them without purpose That (is the) assumption (of) those who disbelieve So woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire

ayah: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا بَٰطِلٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wama khalaqna al-samaa wal-arda wama baynahuma batilan dhalika zannu alladhina kafaru fawaylun lilladhina kafaru mina al-nari
ayah_english: And not We created the heaven and the earth and whatever (is) between them without purpose That (is the) assumption (of) those who disbelieve So woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire

ayah: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا بَٰطِلٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wama khalaqna al-samaa wal-arda wama baynahuma batilan dhalika zannu alladhina kafaru fawaylun lilladhina kafaru mina al-nari
ayah_english: And not We created the heaven and the earth and whatever (is) between them without purpose That (is the) assumption (of) those who disbelieve So woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire

ayah: أَمۡ نَجۡعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ كَٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ نَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلۡفُجَّارِ
ayah_translit: am naj'alu alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati kal-muf'sidina fi al-ardi am naj'alu al-mutaqina kal-fujari
ayah_english: Or should We treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like those who spread corruption in the earth Or should We treat the pious like the wicked

ayah: كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡكَ مُبَٰرَكٞ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakun liyaddabbaru ayatihi waliyatadhakkara ulu al-albabi
ayah_english: (This is) a Book We have revealed it to you blessed that they may ponder (over) its Verses and may be reminded those of understanding those of understanding

ayah: وَوَهَبۡنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
ayah_translit: wawahabna lidawuda sulaymana ni'ma al-'abdu innahu awwabun
ayah_english: And We gave to Dawood Sulaiman an excellent slave Indeed he was one who repeatedly turned

ayah_translit: idh urida alayhi bil-'ashiyi al-safinatu al-jiyadu

ayah: فَقَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَحۡبَبۡتُ حُبَّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتۡ بِٱلۡحِجَابِ
ayah_translit: faqala inni ahbabtu hubba al-khayri an dhik'ri rabbi hatta tawarat bil-hijabi
ayah_english: And he said Indeed I [I] preferred (the) love (of) the good for (the) remembrance (of) my Lord Until they were hidden in the veil

ayah: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ
ayah_translit: rudduha alayya fatafiqa mashan bil-suqi wal-a'naqi
ayah_english: Return them to me Then he began to pass (his hand) over the legs and the necks

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا عَلَىٰ كُرۡسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدٗا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
ayah_translit: walaqad fatanna sulaymana wa-alqayna ala kur'siyyihi jasadan thumma anaba
ayah_english: And certainly We tried Sulaiman and We placed on his throne a body then he turned

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا عَلَىٰ كُرۡسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدٗا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَهَبۡ لِي مُلۡكٗا لَّا يَنۢبَغِي لِأَحَدٖ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِيٓۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡوَهَّابُ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi igh'fir li wahab li mul'kan la yanbaghi li-ahadin min ba'di innaka anta al-wahabu
ayah_english: He said O my Lord Forgive me and grant me a kingdom not (will) belong to anyone after me after me Indeed, You [You] (are) the Bestower

ayah: فَسَخَّرۡنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيۡثُ أَصَابَ
ayah_translit: fasakharna lahu al-riha tajri bi-amrihi rukhaan haythu asaba
ayah_english: Then We subjected to him the wind to flow by his command gently wherever he directed

ayah_english: Then We subjected to him the wind to flow by his command gently wherever he directed

ayah_translit: wal-shayatina kulla bannain waghawwasin

ayah: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
ayah_translit: hadha atauna fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri hisabin
ayah_english: This (is) Our gift so grant or withhold without account

ayah_english: And indeed for him with Us surely is a near access and a good place of return

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بِنُصۡبٖ وَعَذَابٍ
ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur abdana ayyuba idh nada rabbahu anni massaniya al-shaytanu binus'bin wa'adhabin
ayah_english: And remember Our slave Ayyub when he called his Lord That [I] has touched me Shaitaan with distress and suffering

ayah: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ
ayah_translit: ur'kud birij'lika hadha mugh'tasalun baridun washarabun

ayah: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamith'lahum ma'ahum rahmatan minna wadhik'ra li-uli al-albabi
ayah_english: And We granted [to] him his family and a like of them with them a Mercy from Us and a Reminder for those of understanding for those of understanding

ayah: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamith'lahum ma'ahum rahmatan minna wadhik'ra li-uli al-albabi
ayah_english: And We granted [to] him his family and a like of them with them a Mercy from Us and a Reminder for those of understanding for those of understanding

ayah: وَخُذۡ بِيَدِكَ ضِغۡثٗا فَٱضۡرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحۡنَثۡۗ إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَٰهُ صَابِرٗاۚ نِّعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٞ
ayah_translit: wakhudh biyadika digh'than fa-id'rib bihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiran ni'ma al-'abdu innahu awwabun
ayah_english: And take in your hand a bunch and strike with it and (do) not break (your) oath Indeed We [We] found him patient an excellent slave Indeed he repeatedly turned

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عِبَٰدَنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ أُوْلِي ٱلۡأَيۡدِي وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur ibadana ib'rahima wa-is'haqa waya'quba uli al-aydi wal-absari
ayah_english: And remember Our slaves Ibrahim and Ishaq and Ayyub, possessors (of) strength and vision

ayah: إِنَّآ أَخۡلَصۡنَٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٖ ذِكۡرَى ٱلدَّارِ
ayah_translit: inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatin dhik'ra al-dari
ayah_english: Indeed We [We] chose them for an exclusive (quality) remembrance (of) the Home

ayah_translit: wa-innahum indana lamina al-mus'tafayna al-akhyari

ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur is'ma'ila wal-yasa'a wadha al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyari
ayah_english: And remember Ismail and Al-Yasa and Dhul-kifl and Dhul-kifl and all (are) from the best

ayah: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ
ayah_translit: hadha dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqina lahus'na maabin
ayah_english: This (is) a Reminder And indeed for the righteous surely is a good place of return

ayah: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: hadha fawjun muq'tahimun ma'akum la marhaban bihim innahum salu al-nari
ayah_english: This (is) a company bursting in with you No welcome for them Indeed they (will) burn (in) the Fire

ayah: قَالُواْ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِكُمۡۖ أَنتُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرَارُ
ayah_translit: qalu bal antum la marhaban bikum antum qaddamtumuhu lana fabi'sa al-qararu
ayah_english: They say Nay! You no welcome for you You brought this upon us So wretched is the settlement

ayah: قَالُواْ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِكُمۡۖ أَنتُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرَارُ

ayah: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدۡهُ عَذَابٗا ضِعۡفٗا فِي ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: qalu rabbana man qaddama lana hadha fazid'hu adhaban di'fan fi al-nari
ayah_english: They will say Our Lord whoever brought upon us this increase for him a punishment double in the Fire

ayah: وَقَالُواْ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالٗا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَشۡرَارِ
ayah_translit: waqalu ma lana la nara rijalan kunna na'udduhum mina al-ashrari
ayah_english: And they will say What (is) for us not we see men we used (to) count them among the bad ones

ayah: أَتَّخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ
ayah_translit: attakhadhnahum sikh'riyyan am zaghat anhumu al-absaru
ayah_english: Did we take them (in) ridicule or has turned away from them the vision

ayah: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: inna dhalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahli al-nari
ayah_english: Indeed that (is) surely (the) truth (the) quarreling (of the) people (of) the Fire

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٞۖ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
ayah_translit: qul innama ana mundhirun wama min ilahin illa al-lahu al-wahidu al-qaharu
ayah_english: Say Only I am a warner and not (is there) any god except Allah the One the Irresistible

ayah: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-idha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fihi min ruhi faqa'u lahu sajidina

ayah: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسۡجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقۡتُ بِيَدَيَّۖ أَسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَالِينَ
ayah_translit: qala yaib'lisu ma mana'aka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina al-'alina
ayah_english: He said O Iblis! What prevented you that you (should) prostrate to (one) whom I created with My Hands Are you arrogant or are you of the exalted ones

ayah: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ
ayah_translit: qala ana khayrun min'hu khalaqtani min narin wakhalaqtahu min tinin
ayah_english: He said I am better than him You created me from fire and You created him from clay

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

ayah: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: qala fabi'izzatika la-ugh'wiyannahum ajma'ina

ayah: قَالَ فَٱلۡحَقُّ وَٱلۡحَقَّ أَقُولُ
ayah_translit: qala fal-haqu wal-haqa aqulu
ayah_english: He said Then (it is) the truth and the truth I say

ayah: لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabi'aka min'hum ajma'ina
ayah_english: Surely I will fill Hell with you and those who follow you among them all

ayah: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
ayah_translit: qul ma asalukum alayhi min ajrin wama ana mina al-mutakalifina
ayah_english: Say Not I ask of you for it any payment and not I am of the ones who pretend

ayah: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: in huwa illa dhik'run lil'alamina
ayah_english: Not it (is) except a Reminder to the worlds

ayah: وَلَتَعۡلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعۡدَ حِينِۭ
ayah_translit: walata'lamunna naba-ahu ba'da hinin
ayah_english: And surely you will know its information after a time
